title: The Pattern of beauty
creator_credit: Stephen Cross, Paul Keeler and Stephen Cross Ltd
brief_description: Explains and demonstartes some of the ideas which are fundamental to the Islamic visual arts. Islamic art and architecture are based on the tenet that the more beautiful a thing is, the closer it approaches the Real.
